snippet.title: The Wind's Path Demo Trailer - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Play the demo on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3114920/The_Winds_Path_Demo/

The Wind's Path is a top-down #platformer #indiegame made with the #godotengine .
#gameplay running on the #SteamDeck 
Coming soon to #steam 

Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2424500/The_Winds_Path/

Itch.io
https://endless-project.itch.io/winds-path

Gamejolt
https://gamejolt.com/games/Windspath/314458
